Interface RepliableEditorInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryEditor
public interface RepliableEditorInterface
The RepliableEditorInterface is the interface for enquiry editors in the BTO system. It provides the basic functionality that a repliable editor should have.

  • Method Details

    • create

      Repliable create(String content, Applicant applicant)
      Creates a new repliable.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the repliable being created
      applicant - the applicant that created the repliable
      Returns:
      the created repliable

    • edit

      boolean edit(Repliable repliable, String newContent)
      Edits a repliable.
      Parameters:
      repliable - the repliable that is being edited
      newContent - the new content that replaces the repliable's old content
      Returns:
      true if editing was successful, false otherwise

    • delete

      boolean delete(Repliable repliable)
      Deletes a repliable.
      Parameters:
      repliable - the repliable that is being deleted
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • reply

      boolean reply(Repliable repliable, String replyMessage, String responderNric)
      Replies to a repliable with a reply message.
      Parameters:
      repliable - the repliable that is being replied to
      replyMessage - the reply message
      responderNric - the NRIC of the responder
      Returns:
      true if reply was successful, false otherwise

    • viewAll

      List<Repliable> viewAll()
      Views a list of repliable.
      Returns:
      list of repliables

    • viewByApplicant

      List<Repliable> viewByApplicant(Applicant applicant)
      Views a list of repliables by a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant whose repliables to view
      Returns:
      list of repliables by the applicant
